modules.attendance

Class AttendanceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • modules.attendance.AttendanceController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class AttendanceController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Module controller class, showing and enabling to change attendance of students of given group. Object of this class is created only by MyClassesController, in which user can choose one group.
    See Also:
    MyClassesController
